description:
Beautiful home in a walk up building. Living area with couch and tv with roku player along with DVDs and books for reading. Roku comes with Netflix, Hulu, HBO along with many other apps. Two bedrooms both with full size beds and dressers for your belongings. Clean sheets and towels provided. Kitchen is fully equipped with all cookware and utensils along with gas stove and microwave.

Private access

Minimal interaction but available if needed.

Bushwick neighborhood is very trendy area and an art hub of Brooklyn. Tons of galleries, bars, shopping and great restaurants

7 minute walk to L train, 5 minute walk to M train and bus stop a block away. 20 minutes from Manhattan
name: Private 2 bedroom apartment in trendy neighborhood
review: Bel appartement confortable et bien équipé. Proche du métro dans un quartier agréable.
